nudge: What's the last ridiculous thing {wife_name} made you laugh about?
starter: I'm still laughing about when you ___

nudge: What's a weird habit of yours that {wife_name} somehow tolerates?
starter: The fact that you put up with my ___ is why I married you

nudge: What's the most embarrassing thing that's happened to you two as a couple?
starter: Remember when we ___ and ___? I still can't believe that happened

nudge: What's something {wife_name} does that cracks you up but she doesn't realize?
starter: You have no idea how funny it is when you ___

nudge: What's a running joke between you two that no one else gets?
starter: Just thinking about ___ and cracking up at my desk

nudge: What's the last argument you had that was so dumb you both ended up laughing?
starter: Remember when we argued about ___? That was peak us

nudge: If someone made a movie about your marriage, what would the funniest scene be?
starter: If they made a movie about us, the best scene would be when ___

nudge: What's something {wife_name} is weirdly competitive about?
starter: I love how you turn ___ into a competition. Never change.

nudge: What food is {wife_name} most protective of? (The one you can't touch.)
starter: I thought about eating your ___ today. Then I remembered I value my life.

nudge: What's the most 'you two' thing about your relationship?
starter: No other couple on earth ___ like we do. That's our thing.

nudge: What's the worst date you two have ever been on?
starter: Remember that time we tried to ___ and it went completely sideways? Best worst date ever.

nudge: What's an inside joke that would make zero sense to anyone else?
starter: Two words: ___. (If anyone else read this they'd think we're insane.)

nudge: What celebrity does {wife_name} have an unreasonable obsession with?
starter: I saw ___ on TV and thought of you. I'm choosing not to be jealous.

nudge: What's something {wife_name} always says she'll do but never actually does?
starter: Hey remember when you said you were going to ___? That was ___ ago. Just checking in.

nudge: What's the most {wife_name} thing {wife_name} has ever done?
starter: You did the most you thing today: ___
